    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection​(java.lang.Integer chId)
      if the game has not started the connections is closed if the game has started, sets the players unavailable and notifies the lobby
      Parameters:
      chId - disconnected client handler's id

    • checkLobby

      public int checkLobby()
      Returns:
      id of the non-full lobby, -1 otherwise

      vc - virtual client to be removed

    • removeVirtualClient

      public void removeVirtualClient​(java.lang.Integer chId)
      removes a virtual client from its lobby, if the lobby is empty it gets deleted
      Parameters:
      chId - virtual client's id

    • searchVirtualClient

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • reconnect

      swaps old virtual client with new virtual client after reconnection
      Parameters:
      vc - new virtual client
      oldVc - old virtual client

    • addVirtualClient

      public void addVirtualClient​(VirtualClient vc) throws ReconnectionException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      handles client register response
      Parameters:
      vc - virtual client to be added
      Throws:
      ReconnectionException - when a client reconnects
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the client's nickname is already taken

    • getNickLobbyMap

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getNickLobbyMap()

    • createNewLobby

      public void createNewLobby​(int nPlayers, ClientHandler clientHandler) throws IllegalPlayersNumberException
      creates new lobby and adds the client that created it if the lobby is full (singleplayer) the game starts
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - lobby size
      clientHandler - client that created the lobby
      Throws:
      IllegalPlayersNumberException

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      creates server (new or from save) and starts it
      Parameters:
      args - used for restart after crash
